programme.title: The Ghost Blows the Lamp of the Longling Temple
programme.desc: Since coming back from the ancient city of Jingjue, Shirley Yang found that her back suddenly grew out the eye ball erythema, she decided to return to China to find Professor Sun to discuss the way to get rid of erythema. Shirley Yang found professor sun was trapped in the mysterious Long Ling Cave. On the way she met Hu Bayi, Wang Kai-xuan and big gold teeth who are going to search the Tang tomb for treasures, they went all the way into the ghost burial to find professor sun.

programme.title: The Demon Suppressors: West Barbarian Beast
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of the 40th years of Wangzhao Dynasty, the west barbarian beast Lord was born bringing chaos to the world again. The Demon Suppressors of the town bravely wen to the expedition to the West and fight the devil.

programme.title: Fengshen: Paiting Saint's Back
programme.desc: At the end of the Shang Dynasty, King Jiang Ziya led the gods to attack the King Zhou, and after the war, he returned to the forest. But the magic pen used by the king was lost for thousands of years and disappeared. A thousand years later, the Kaiyuan period. Tang Dynasty painter Wu Daozi for wanted the "Painting Saint" name, accidentally found traces of the pen. All of a sudden,the chaos in human world began.

programme.title: The Great Buddha Plus
programme.desc: A night watchman and his buddy uncover some unsavory video of his politically well-connected but overly amorous boss.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: In the puppet state of Manchukuo in the 1930s, four Communist party special agents, after returning to China, embark on a secret mission. Sold out by a traitor, the team find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides.

programme.title: Longmen Town Inn
programme.desc: Tired of rivalries and feuds in jianghu world, the great master Wolong Jianxian founded town of Dragon Gate deep in the desert. For people who have washed their hands and ready to begin new life, only the Dragon Gate Inn welcomes guests from outside.

programme.title: Tiger Robbers
programme.desc: Based on a novel 'A Cheerful Gang Turns the Earth' by Isaka Kotaro. It tells the adventure story of four strange youths forming a group of "robbers".

programme.title: A Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Ning Caichen is the teacher of Lanruo town, came across Xiaoqian who was chased after by Spirit Hunter, and rescued her. Ning Caichen believes that even spirits can be divided into good and evil, and can coexist with human peacefully. While the Spirit Bound Snake Spirit Grandma revivify Black Hill who already was sealed for many years, and kill people, this is a human disaster undoubtedly. Ning Caichen is to protect common people, and resolutely decides to head for the junction of person and spirit, fought with others to destroys dark force, also gave his precious life however.

programme.title: A Fairy Tale 2
programme.desc: In the first film, Ning Chaichen was killed when he tried to save the lives of the people. This time Nie Xiaoqian went through 800 years ago, and wanted to find Ning Caichen only to found that Ning Caichen was the person in charge of Zixiao Door named as Qin Yangming. Qin Yangming cares about people, and wants the peace between the two worlds......

programme.title: A First Farewell
programme.desc: When Isa is not at school or working on his parents' farmyard, he spends carefree days with his friends - until the outside world starts forcing him to say one goodbye after another.

programme.title: Ever Since We love
programme.desc: Ever Since We Love revolves around a medical school student whose ego constantly gets hurt by three disparate women heâ€™s attracted to.

programme.title: The Underground War
programme.desc: In 2248, Fang Yi of dormant C40 team captain and his team member were waken up by artificial intelligence control system "the light of long night", and will execute a top secret mission -- dive into gene medicine research center, destroy all medicine and test data. And the research center has suffered Mr.Dee the Black Feather's invasion, to obtain the authority that extends dormancy, C40 team must accept this life and death mission...

programme.title: Love Will Tear Us Apart
programme.desc: Ten years ago, Ly Qinyang confessed his love for Ling Yiyao in front of the whole school. He promised to marry her in the future and never regret it. Ten years of romance between the two started there.

programme.title: Detective Dee: Tongtian Hierarch
programme.desc: The famous detective Dee Renjie in Tang Dynasty. This time the story starts from a political rumor that Wu Meiniang was going to stage a coup and become the empress. At that time, many ministers were against Wu Meiniang to be the queen. The emperor didn't have a choice but to search her.
